bugs.summary: Allow activating cubeb logging via about:networking
Change cubeb vendoring manifest, swapping out cubeb_tracing.h with something that uses MicroGeckoProfiler.h
Crash tests should collapse selection to end of text node rather than end of parent parent element to emulate the behavior before bug 1789967
Make XUL splitters use the height property rather than attribute.
Enable ESlint rule no-unused-vars on the global scope for more places
Contents of dialog are truncated( or shrink) when resize `View Certificates...` dialog etc
Use lazy getters rather than eager getters in browser-custom-element.js
